title.value: V2 Table Code System: Delayed acknowledgment type

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify a response type used in deferred processing two phase reply for delayed acknowldgement mode of the original acknowledgement mechanism defined in HL7 Version 2.x messaging and used in the MSH segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0102 (Delayed acknowledgment type)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Message received, stored for later processing

definition.value: Message received, stored for later processing
